_source: http://v.web.umkc.edu/vanhornj/shannonradii.htm; R. D. Shannon Acta Cryst. A32, 751-767.

_notes.C: calculated from bond length - bond strength equations
_notes.A: Ahrens (1952) ionic radius; L. H. Ahrens. Published in 1952 Geochim. Cosmochim. Acta, 2, Pages 155-169.
_notes.P: Pauling (1960) crystal radius; The Nature of the Chemical Bond, L. Pauling. Published in 1961 by Ithaca: Cornell University Press
